name: JSONParser_getJSONIntValueTest
description: Unit tests for the JSONParser.getJSONIntValue method.

test_cases.name: testGetJSONIntValue_Success
test_cases.description: Tests the successful retrieval of an integer value from a JSON string.

test_cases.name: testGetJSONIntValue_Failure
test_cases.description: Tests the failure scenario where a non-integer value is expected to throw a JSONException.
